descriptions.zh: 新年是世界各地普遍庆祝的节日，标志着新一年的开始。人们通常会举行各种庆祝活动，如烟花表演、家庭聚会等。
descriptions.en: New Year's Day is a global holiday celebrating the beginning of a new calendar year. People typically celebrate with fireworks, parties, and family gatherings.

customs.zh: 放烟花、倒数计时、新年愿望

activities.en: New Year's Eve party, family gathering

history.zh: 新年庆祝活动可以追溯到古罗马时期。
history.en: New Year celebrations can be traced back to ancient Roman times.

descriptions.zh: 情人节是恋人之间互表爱意的节日，通常会赠送鲜花、巧克力和贺卡。
descriptions.en: Valentine's Day is a holiday when lovers express their affection with greetings and gifts. It is celebrated in many countries around the world.

descriptions.zh: 国际劳动节是世界上许多国家的法定假日，旨在庆祝工人阶级的贡献和成就。
descriptions.en: International Labor Day, also known as May Day, is a celebration of laborers and the working classes.

descriptions.zh: 圣诞节是基督教纪念耶稣诞生的节日，现已成为全球性的文化节日，人们会交换礼物、装饰圣诞树，与家人团聚。
descriptions.en: Christmas is an annual festival commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ. It is widely celebrated around the world, both as a religious and cultural event.

customs.zh: 装饰圣诞树、交换礼物、唱圣诞歌
customs.en: Decorating Christmas tree, exchanging gifts, singing carols
